summary: Allows the player to role play religious devotion to one of the many Aedra, Daedra, and spiritual paths.
descriptionHtml:
This is currently a WIP, so no file has been uploaded.  Right now, this is a placeholder to help motivate me to get this thing finished.  I will remove this disclaimer once I upload the file and make the page public.

Idea:  Adds religious devotion to Skyrim, with a similar mechanic to Needs mods, with the obvious exceptions that religious worship is voluntary and that changes in status would be much slower.  It was inspired by the request and later creation of Patron Gods of Skyrim by Robbie:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65607/?]Patron Gods of Skyrim[/url].  However, the goal is very different.  While I really like the idea of getting bonuses due to having a patron deity, I wanted something more interactive and long term with responsibilities as well as bonuses.

Mechanic:  There are essentially two types of religious devotion within this mod:  those that involve an actual being with a personality (Aedra, Daedra, etc.) and those that do not (spiritual paths).  For personality devotion, you start earning "favor points" as soon as you start doing things in Skyrim.  Some things will please some deities, and you will gain favor with them.  Once you reach a certain level of favor, you can choose to deepen your relationship with that particular deity.  For non-personality devotion, you ...

Will finish this if Nexus staff says that hidden WIP mod pages are okay.
